source: TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_SEQ_00<tab>Sorocan gazes into the distance, a concerned frown upon her face.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_SEQ_00<tab>明けの玉座のソロサンは、忘れ物を届けてほしいようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the Oroniri leather bag to Khaidai.
TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_TODO_01<tab>Survey the area for desertmaker beetles and use the vials of acid to slay any that appear.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_TODO_01<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA69501 /var>で見渡し、現れた<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2173401 /var>に
<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D7B01 /var>を使い討伐

source: TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_SOROCAN_000_000<tab>If your attire is anything to go by, you must be the traveler I have heard so much about. I am glad our paths have crossed.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_SOROCAN_000_000<tab>ちょいと、そこの<var 08 E905 ((お嬢さん)) ((お兄さん)) /var>。
外から来た旅人って、アンタのことだろ？
下に行く用事があるなら、ひとつ頼まれてくれないかい。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_SOROCAN_000_001<tab>Earlier, my husband left to take some of our sheep to the grazing fields, and in his haste, forgot his medicine bag. I fear without it, he may not be able to contend with the dangerous pests that roam there.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_SOROCAN_000_001<tab>うちの旦那、そこそこ腕は立つのに、おっちょこちょいなのよ。
今日も、朝早くから放牧に出たのはいいけど、
大事な薬を、忘れていっちまってね。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_SOROCAN_000_002<tab>Please, see that it reaches him quickly. You should be able to find him to the south of here, tending to a flock of sheep.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_SOROCAN_000_002<tab>よかったら、この「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D7A01 /var>」を、
旦那の「カイダイ」に届けてくれないかね。
今頃は南の草原で、羊たちの世話をしてるはずさ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_SOROCAN_000_003<tab>I only hope it is not too late. Please hurry, for the grazing lands are often filled with danger.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_SOROCAN_000_003<tab>よかったら、その「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D7A01 /var>」を、
旦那の「カイダイ」に届けてくれないかね。
今頃は南の草原で、羊たちの世話をしてるはずさ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_KHAIDAI_000_010<tab>Who are you and what have you come here for?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_KHAIDAI_000_010<tab>なんだ、お前は……。
俺に何か、用でもあるのか？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_KHAIDAI_000_011<tab>Sorocan sent you to deliver this to me? Unfortunately, you came too late.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_KHAIDAI_000_011<tab>この袋は……そうか、妻から頼まれたのか。
手数をかけてしまったな。
届けてくれたのはありがたいのだが、少し遅かった……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_KHAIDAI_000_012<tab>You see, desertmaker beetles run rampant in this area. This bag contains a few vials of acid, which softens their tough carapace and renders them defenseless.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_KHAIDAI_000_012<tab>こいつは、牧草を蝕む甲虫を倒すための秘薬でな。
硬い甲殻を軟化させることができるのだ。
いつものように甲虫を駆除しようとしたのだが……

source: TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_KHAIDAI_000_013<tab>The creatures are incredibly tenacious and are difficult to take down without the help of this mixture. Earlier, I attempted to drive one off on my own and was injured.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_KHAIDAI_000_013<tab>秘薬を忘れていたため、逆襲を受けて負傷してしまったのだ。
なんとも情けない話なのだが、心優しい旅人よ。
怪我をした俺の代わりに、甲虫の駆除を頼めぬだろうか？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_KHAIDAI_000_014<tab>While I remain here to recover, would you go and clear the surrounding area of these beetles for me?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_KHAIDAI_000_014<tab>周りを「見渡し」て、「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2173401 /var>」が現れたら、
その「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D7B01 /var>」をかけるのだ。
そうすれば、簡単に倒すことができるだろう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_KHAIDAI_000_015<tab>Here, take these vials. Empty their contents upon any desertmaker beetle that comes at you. It will make them that much easier to kill.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_KHAIDAI_000_015<tab>奴らが現れそうな場所は、全部で3カ所ある。
地図に印をつけておくゆえ、見つけ次第、討伐を頼んだぞ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_KHAIDAI_000_016<tab>Please see that the neighboring areas are cleared of any stray desertmaker beetles. In the meantime, I shall remain here and gather my strength.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_KHAIDAI_000_016<tab>奴らが現れそうな場所は、全部で3カ所ほどある。
そこで「見渡して」、<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2173401 /var>が現れたら、
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D7B01 /var>」をかけて討伐するのだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_KHAIDAI_000_020<tab>The beetles are gone, I take it? Now finally my sheep can graze in peace and I need not fear facing another one under less-than-favorable circumstances. Thank you.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_KHAIDAI_000_020<tab>無事に<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2173401 /var>を駆除できたようだな。
感謝するぞ、旅人よ。
おかげで羊たちも、大いに草を食み腹を満たせた。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_KHAIDAI_000_021<tab>In addition to being organized, my wife has a knack for picking out reliable individuals. I cannot count the number of times I have been saved by that woman. I do not know what I would do without her...
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_KHAIDAI_000_021<tab>俺の妻は、しっかり者で、本当に頼りになるのだ。
そんな彼女に、俺は何度救われたことか……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_KHAIDAI_000_022<tab>B-But don't you ever tell her that I said that! As an Oroniri man, it is my duty to protect her, not the other way around.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_KHAIDAI_000_022<tab>だが、俺はオロニル族の戦士。
妻には、感謝の言葉よりも夫としての強さを見せねば。
……俺が妻を頼りにしていたなどと、絶対に言うなよ？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_KHAIDAI_000_023<tab>Now then, if you want your reward, you best return to my wife. She will see that you are fairly compensated for your services.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_KHAIDAI_000_023<tab>……さて、お前は妻のもとに戻るがいい。
しっかり者の俺の妻のことだ、
きっと報酬を用意しているに違いないだろう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_SOROCAN_000_030<tab>Oh! You are back! My husband was not hurt, was he?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_SOROCAN_000_030<tab>あら、ちゃんと革袋を届けてくれたみたいだね。
うちの旦那、困ってなかったかい？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_SOROCAN_100_031<tab>Bahaha! Perhaps now he has finally learned his lesson!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_SOROCAN_100_031<tab>そりゃあ、旦那もアンタも災難だったね！
でも、これに懲りて、少しは落ち着きが出るといいんだけど。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_SOROCAN_000_031<tab><sigh> Then again, I suppose I cannot complain. While Khaidai may not have the eye for detail that I do, he is an incredibly kind man and does what he can to take care of both me and our sheep.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_SOROCAN_000_031<tab>あの人ったら、腕っ節は強いけどおっちょこちょいでね。
けど、羊もアタシのことも、とっても大事にしてくれる、
心の優しい人なんだよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_SOROCAN_000_032<tab>Ah─but forgive me. You have not come all this way to hear me talk about my husband! Please, take this and feel free to be on your way!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ601_02779_SOROCAN_000_032<tab>ふふ、惚気を聞かせちまったね。
とにかく、ありがとう、旅人さん。
よければまた、旦那の手伝いをしてやっておくれ。
